findings.fixTitle: Add TL;DR summary near the hero
findings.why: No TL;DR or key takeaway statements were found within the first screenful.
findings.snippetHtml:
TL;DR

{Replace with a 2-sentence summary that states the claim and the measurable outcome customers care about.}

findings.fixTitle: Pair each claim with inline evidence
findings.where: Within the first two body sections.
findings.why: Paragraphs mention benefits without citing primary sources or data.
findings.snippetHtml: Claim: Teams that ship weekly GEO audits improve answer surfaces within 2 sprints. Evidence: According to Forrester, 2025, programs with structured audits saw a 31% lift in AI-ready snippets.

findings.fixTitle: Add citations next to bold claims
findings.where: Wherever metrics or rankings are listed.
findings.why: Claims are not followed by outbound, primary-source links.
findings.snippetHtml: Claim: Intro to How Structured Data Markup Works | Google Search Central | Documentation | Google for Developers reduces hallucinated answers by 48%. Evidence: According to Internal Study, 2025 across 120 intents.

findings.fixTitle: Add Article schema describing the page
Expand schema with author, dates, publisher, and mainEntity
findings.why: Schema is missing author/publisher/date properties required for rich results.

findings.fixTitle: Align H1, title, and schema names
findings.why: The H1 text does not match the <title> and schema headline.
findings.snippetHtml: Intro to How Structured Data Markup Works | Google Search Central | Documentation | Google for Developers

findings.why: Organization schema is missing sameAs links to public profiles.

findings.fixTitle: Display Updated on near the title
findings.why: No visible updated timestamp was found near the hero.

findings.fixTitle: Link to release notes or changelog
findings.why: No changelog links or version history references were detected.
